keywords.indexterm: Editing Relax NG Schemaseditor specific actions

body.p: The list of actions specific for the Relax NG (full syntax) editor is:

ul.li:
Document Schema contextual menu of current editor Show Definition
(also available on the contextual menu of the editor panel) - Moves the cursor to the definition of the current element in this Relax NG (full syntax) schema. You can use the shortcut on a reference to display its definition.
